page.title: 11ROAD SAFETY IN THE SUBURBS
page.content: In recent years there has been an {enormous increase}in the traffic using the roads around Hatherley.For instance a{fourfold}increase in traffic passing Lakeside School since the late sixties. Since 1980 several{serious accidents have happened,mostly involving young people.In 1984 a cyclist was killed near the school and in 1983 another very seriously injured.Over a three year period 36 children from the local secondary school were injured in road accidents. The police and road safety officers have tried to solve the problem but so far with little success.The class consider that there are two main causes,{cars are driven much too fast and{young cyclists use the roads in a {very dangerous way.
